### What to submit for Week 4

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(unchecked, 
               checked, 
               checked,
               checked),

Description = c("Complete modules in Data Camp that leaves the basics of R and introduces inferences.",
               "Complete a Request for Proposal or better known as an RFP.",
               "Amend your draft as needed.",
               "Submit your Week 4 Reflections."),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/04-lesson/#data-camp-1)", 
             "[Link](/assignment/04-exercise/#task-rfps-with-reliability-and-validity)",

)
```
